Summary Note:
The RM is Bruno Malatesta Landi's brother-in-law, having married his's sister. This family connection has strengthened their professional collaboration, allowing for seamless communication and trust.
With a career spanning nearly 46 years, Bruno Malatesta Landi has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons he decided to join.
Family Background: Bruno Malatesta Landi is currently widowed. His child is named Sofia.
Education Background:
Bruno earned his secondary school diploma from Liceo Artistico Statale Umberto Boccioni Milano in 1974.
Bruno earned his degree from American University of Rome in 1977.
Occupation History:
Bruno Malatesta Landi is a seasoned professional with over 46 years of experience.
At Crucell N.V., Bruno Malatesta Landi held the position of Research Scientist from 1979 to 1981, developing essential skills in the field.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Biotech Startup Founder at Philips Healthcare in 1981, further expanding his skill set.
In 1985, he joined Philips Healthcare as a CEO, taking on new challenges and responsibilities that helped him grow both personally and professionally.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 890000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
He owns condo in Leeuwarden, where he resides. It is worth 1148000 EUR.

In addition to his primary residence, he owns flat in Naples worth 563000 EUR.

Moreover, he has invested in additional property in Reggio Calabria, giving possiblity for generating additional income. The villa is valued at 2330000 EUR.

He does not have any inheritances.
